title: How you feel when you're playing a champ that you're good at

replies.body: Huh, didn't know that Jesse played League, let alone Ryze.
THAT'S JAMES YOU UNCULTURED SWINE, AND HE PLAYS KATARINA
Are you sure, to me it looks like he plays a lot of {{champion:143}}
Irelia, actually.
i dont think you actually  play irelia

I play Garen.

SAME gotta love that regen and combo

everytime I get {{champion:62}} in aram
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/lol.gif

{{champion:92}}  

http://40.media.tumblr.com/ce7fc8377fdcb8ffecb5bb91a4381dda/tumblr_inline_nnormhD8Jp1slk9fp_500.jpg
Where'd you fine that?

And then you feed all game 
http://rack.3.mshcdn.com/media/ZgkyMDEzLzA3LzE4Lzc1L0RyLldoby41Mjg5ZC5naWYKcAl0aHVtYgkxMjAweDk2MDA-/571ec44d/6da/Dr.-Who.gif

I know the feel, especially when it is a mirror match and you never played a mirror match with your main. Had that happen today playing fiora, there are not many people playing fiora so I was not use to it I got flamed because of that.

Eh. I only need a few buttons: W, E, R, and maybe D.

{{champion:90}} with {{summoner:14}}
When mid asks you to gank a fed Malzahar
Aw come on- the Q is super-op once you get the hang of landing it. Possibly 3 person 2.5 second silence? Devastating
I WOULD agree with you, except I'm almost never actually able to land the Q.  That is probably the ONE thing that I don't really like about my Main-man Malzahar.
It just takes a lot of practice. Once you get the hang of it, you'll have a lot more success with him, because it can turn fights you'd otherwise lose into easy wins.
Your opponents must be smart. If your enemy is stupid, you only need W.

*cries in the corner*

Every bronze {{champion:84}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} in a fight.
I carried myself out of bronze using Vladimir and Tryndamere.

I carried myself out of Bronze playing stuff like full AP Nami mid and every other champion with AP scalings for the first time.

That's not really hard.
I know it's supposed to be a joke, but some of those are exaggerated XD.

I understand because

{{champion:1}} is 450, she would be one of my first picks for Ranked since I would had played her a lot
{{champion:63}} should get some love. i don't see him much anymore.
{{champion:105}} can't say he's just for bronze because this guy is played everywere
{{champion:67}} my good friend in gold 3 mains her

i for one would rather play harder to understand champs like {{champion:26}} as support; {{champion:77}} in top lane; {{champion:17}} as ADC; {{champion:45}} in mid; and i'm pretty much new to all champs in the jungle.
